content: it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws oak leaves written pattern and chart page 10 any yarn color 4 5mm hook if using medium yarn r 1 chain 12 turn starting in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 3 st half_double_crochet 3 st double_crochet 4 st in the last st 6 double_crochet turning the corner to work opposite side of chain double_crochet 4 st half_double_crochet 3 st single_crochet 3 st ch1 turn 26 total st r 2 single_crochet 1 st half_double_crochet 1 st 3 double_crochet in next st ch3 slip_stitch to same st slip_stitch 1 st x3 in the next st 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet in the next st 1 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet turning the corner to work other side slip_stitch 2 st ch3 3 double_crochet in the same space half_double_crochet 1 st single_crochet 1 st x3 2 treble_crochet 6 single_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 20 double_crochet 12 slip_stitch 6 ch3 stem slip_stitch into the opposite side s first single_crochet of row 2 see photos  and chain 5 turn starting in 2nd chain from the hook slip_stitch 4 st it s optional to slip_stitch to the body of the leaf to secure the stem fasten_off leaving long yarn to sew to acorn top s stem 9 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of
